def missing(nums, stri):
    nums = sorted(nums)
    stri = stri.replace(" ","")
    return "".join([stri[i].lower() for i in nums]) if max(nums)< len(stri) else "No mission today"

def missing(nums, str):
    return ''.join([str.replace(" ","").lower()[i] for i in sorted(nums)]) if max(nums) < len(str.replace(" ","")) else "No mission today"
